title: Senior Legal Consultant
description:
Description

Als Legal Consultant ben je betrokken bij opdrachten die alle juridische aspecten van pensioen en pensioenuitvoering kunnen bestrijken. Hierbij zorg je samen met jouw collega´s voor adviezen en presentaties en kom je tot klantgerichte oplossingen.

Wat ga je doen?

  • Je bent het aanspreekpunt voor uiteenlopende juridische vraagstukken van zowel collega´s als van klanten. Ook werk je nauw samen met andere professionals binnen WTW, zoals actuarissen en investment consultants. Je kijkt dan ook verder dan je eigen vakgebied om zo tot een optimale oplossing te komen voor de vaak complexe vraagstukken;
  • Je werkt zowel voor pensioenfondsen als voor ondernemingen op o.a. het gebied van (verzekerde) arbeidsvoorwaarden. Het komt ook regelmatig voor dat je te maken hebt met multinationals waarvan de contactpersonen in het buitenland zitten. De mix tussen pensioenfondsen, Nederlandse ondernemingen en multinationals zorgen voor uiteenlopende juridische vraagstukken. Je bent bijvoorbeeld betrokken bij het ontwerpen en wijzigen van de inhoud van een pensioenregeling en de vastlegging daarvan in een pensioenovereenkomst of cao;
  • Je helpt pensioenfondsen met een goed werkende opzet van bestuur en organisatie en je adviseert over hoe een pensioenfonds kan zorgen dat het wettelijke en interne regels naleeft en helpt dat in de praktijk te brengen;
  • In het kader van de aanstaande Wet toekomst pensioenen ga je zowel pensioenfondsen als ondernemingen adviseren en helpen om ‘WTP-proof’ te worden;
  • Je signaleert en interpreteert nieuwe wet- en regelgeving en jurisprudentie en je kijkt naar de gevolgen en de kansen daarvan voor collega´s en onze relaties.

Qualifications

Wat vragen wij van jou?

  • Een afgeronde WO studie Nederlands Recht;
  • Ten minste 7 jaar relevante werkervaring als pensioenjurist of consultant;
  • Goede vakinhoudelijke kennis van pensioenrecht en bij voorkeur ook van relevante rechtsgebieden zoals arbeidsrecht of fiscaal recht;
  • Ervaring met het aansturen van een team in een soortgelijke rol;
  • Een consulting mindset;
  • Proactief, flexibel, leergierig en klantgericht;
  • Goede beheersing van de Nederlands en Engelse taal in woord en geschrift.

Wat bieden wij jou?

  • Een aantrekkelijk salaris;
  • Een goede werkomgeving in een dynamisch en getalenteerd team;
  • De mogelijkheid om je expertise, competenties en professionele positie te ontwikkelen, terwijl WTW investeert in de middelen en mogelijkheden die zorgen voor een voortdurende ontwikkeling;
  • Flexibele werkstijlen, zoals hybride werken.
  • Een diverse, wereldwijde werkomgeving waarin wij geloven dat gevarieerde teams betere beslissingen nemen, creatiever zijn en beter zijn in het oplossen van complexe problemen;
  • Een werkplek die verscheidenheid niet alleen toestaat maar ook toejuicht, waar een inclusieve cultuur wordt bevorderd en waar wordt gewerkt op basis van openheid en eerlijkheid.

Interesse?
Solliciteer via onze carrièrepagina.

WTW is an Equal Opportunity Employer

Descrição da Vaga

  1. Coordenar e orientar as atividades da equipe do setor sob sua responsabilidade, definindo prioridades e acompanhando a realização dos trabalhos para que sejam executados nos prazos e formas previstos.
  2. Tomar decisões quanto as alternativas para o desenvolvimento dos trabalhos.
  3. Promover o treinamento e o desenvolvimento da equipe sob sua responsabilidade, através da avaliação de atendimento, da identificação de necessidades e de prioridades de qualificação dos colaboradores, bem como efetuar devolutivas de desempenho aos membros da equipe.
  4. Promover a integração, motivação e coesão da equipe.
  5. Contribuir nos processos de admissões, desligamentos, transferências e reconhecimento de colaboradores.
  6. Solicitar a aquisição de recursos materiais e/ou de tecnologia necessários à execução dos trabalhos no setor sob sua responsabilidade, controlando a sua utilização como forma de evitar desperdícios e ruptura nos serviços.
  7. Atuar como facilitador na interface com fornecedores e clientes internos e/ou externos, preservando os interesses da Empresa acima do interesse do setor.
  8. Contribuir na definição das metas estabelecidas para o setor sob sua responsabilidade.

title: Senior Engineer - Developer Productivity Engineering - Near Shore
description:
Senior Software Engineer - Developer Productivity Engineering

Full Time

About the Role:

As a Senior Developer Productivity Engineer at NinjaOne, you are not just part of a technology team but a pivotal player in a challenging and innovative environment. In your role, you will be instrumental in shaping and maintaining our cloud infrastructure and ensuring seamless deployment, management, and processes of our IT Operations SaaS products.

Your journey at NinjaOne involves a collaborative and dynamic engagement with software developers, quality assurance engineers, and various stakeholders. You will enhance our development process's efficiency, effectiveness, and productivity. By optimizing workflows, building tools, and advancing build and test processes, you ensure our platform's operational and development excellence.

Location: Ecuador, Colombia, Brazil, and Mexico

What You'll be Doing:

  1. Collaborate closely with Software Engineers and Product Managers to deliver scalable and reliable full-stack services, focusing on improving developer productivity.
  2. Provide technical expertise in full-stack development and DevOps best practices.
  3. Contribute to developing and optimizing CI/CD pipelines, facilitating seamless provisioning and deployment of applications.
  4. Engage in continuously improving our platform’s architecture, ensuring high availability and scalability.
  5. Assist in deployments and release management across various environments.
  6. Develop and implement processes to enhance operational efficiency, maintain security compliance, and improve developer experience.
  7. Mentor team members in full-stack development and DPE practices.
  8. Serve as a technical point of contact for production support and offer guidance during business hours and after-hours as needed.

About You:

  1. Bachelor’s degree in technology (preferred but not required).
  2. 5+ years of experience in full-stack development in a cloud-based environment.
  3. Strong experience in AWS and familiarity with Infrastructure as Code technologies (e.g., AWS Cloud Formation, CDK, Ansible, Terraform).
  4. Proficient in scripting languages such as Shell, Go, Python, or Typescript.
  5. Knowledgeable in agile tooling (Jira, Confluence), version control systems (Git, BitBucket, GitLab), and CI/CD tools (Circle CI a plus).
  6. Experience with both monolithic and container-based application architectures.
  7. Strong understanding of cloud infrastructure, operations, and native cloud application development.
  8. Excellent communication skills and the ability to coach and mentor team members.

About Us:

NinjaOne automates the hardest parts of IT, empowering more than 17,000 IT teams with visibility, security, and control over all endpoints. The NinjaOne platform is proven to increase productivity while reducing risk and IT costs. NinjaOne is consistently ranked #1 for its world-class support and is the top-rated software on G2 in seven categories including endpoint management, remote monitoring and management, and patch management.

What You’ll Love:

We are a collaborative, kind, and curious community.

We honor your flexibility needs with full-time work that is remote.

We prioritize your work-life balance with our unlimited PTO.

We reward your work with opportunities for growth and advancement.

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, veteran status, or any other status protected by applicable law. We are committed to providing an inclusive and diverse work environment.

title: Senior Data Scientist, Risk
description:
Brex is the AI-powered spend platform. We help companies spend with confidence with integrated corporate cards, banking, and global payments, plus intuitive software for travel and expenses. Tens of thousands of companies from startups to enterprises — including DoorDash, Flexport, and Compass — use Brex to proactively control spend, reduce costs, and increase efficiency on a global scale.

Working at Brex allows you to push your limits, challenge the status quo, and collaborate with some of the brightest minds in the industry. We’re committed to building a diverse team and inclusive culture and believe your potential should only be limited by how big you can dream. We make this a reality by empowering you with the tools, resources, and support you need to grow your career.

Engineering at Brex

The Engineering team includes Data, IT, Security, and Software, and is responsible for building innovative products and infrastructure for both internal and external users. We have multiple autonomous and collaborative teams who are eager to learn, teach, and constantly improve how things work. Together, we strive to build robust and scalable systems that enable Brex to grow rapidly and help our customers reach their full potential.

The Risk Data Science team leverages data and AI to manage financial risk (fraud, money laundering, and credit), striking a balance between mitigating those risks and creating a positive experience for our customers.

What you’ll do

Our Data Scientists are responsible for the entire model development lifecycle from conception with stakeholders, developing the model in a notebook, putting it into production, and circling back with stakeholders to make product or strategic decisions.

Responsibilities

  1. Drive Data & AI solutions from inception to deployment to efficiently manage risk
  2. Be responsible for the full machine learning lifecycle: data acquisition, model design, training, productionization, and monitoring
  3. Partner with cross-functional teams (Ops, Engineering, Product, Fraud, Compliance, and Credit)

Requirements

  1. 4+ years of experience in Data Science/ML roles
  2. Expertise with Python programming, SQL queries, and ML-related frameworks
  3. Previous experience in the Risk domain (Fraud, AML, and/or Credit)
  4. Strong communication and interpersonal skills
  5. English proficiency/fluency, both written and speaking (note: interviews will be conducted in English)
  6. Must be willing to work in office 2 days per week on Wednesday and Thursday.
  7. Experience working with real-time data sets
  8. Experience in the finance industry

Location

  1. Must be working in Brazil at the start of role

title: Senior Product Manager Integrations CODE
description:
Senior Product Manager Integrations CODE

Location

São Paulo, São Paulo, Brazil

Salary

62500 - 110000 a year (Reals)

Description

Apply now for a career that puts wellbeing first!

GET TO KNOW US

Wellhub (formerly Gympass*) is a corporate wellness platform that connects employees to the best partners for fitness, mindfulness, therapy, nutrition, and sleep, all included in one subscription designed to cost less than each individual partner. Founded in 2012 and headquartered in NYC, we have a growing global team in 11 countries. At Wellhub, you have the opportunity to build a career in a high-growth tech company that places wellbeing at the foundation of its culture, and contribute to making every company a wellness company.

*Big news: Gympass is now Wellhub!
We are thrilled to announce our rebranding as Wellhub, marking a significant milestone in our journey. This transformation reflects our evolution from a “pass for gyms” to a comprehensive employee wellbeing solution. With our refreshed identity, we are poised to embark on an exciting new chapter of growth and expansion. We are elevating our offerings, including a completely new app experience and an expanded network of wellbeing partners.

THE OPPORTUNITY

We are hiring a Senior Product Manager to our Integrations team, part of CODE Focus Area, in Brazil !

CODE leads the consumer digital experience providing user-focused excellent experiences enabling business scale and sustainable growth. CODE (Consumer Digital Experience) is responsible for evolving our product towards providing a simple, engaging and delightful experience to attract and retain more subscribers, helping them start and cultivate their wellbeing journey with Wellhub.

YOUR IMPACT

As a Senior Product Manager of Integrations, you'll play a crucial role in developing and implementing strategies to seamlessly integrate the Wellhub marketplace with different types of third parties such as Content Management Systems (CMS), Partner Apps and Wearables devices. Offering a frictionless experience to our user regardless of the type of partner they are interested in.

  • Lead the product integration roadmap ensuring that we are prioritizing the most impactful initiatives and we are aligned with Wellhub goals;
  • Conduct in-depth market research understanding the industry trends and best practices identifying integration opportunities and potential new partnerships;
  • Collaborating with cross-functional teams such as engineering, data, sales, marketing to ensure that all of us are moving towards the same goals;
  • Monitor and analyze key performance metrics to optimize integration features and address the main necessities for our company and users;
  • Maintain and evolve our developers portal providing all the relevant information about how to integrate with us;
  • Live the mission: inspire and empower others by genuinely caring for your own wellbeing and your colleagues. Bring wellbeing to the forefront of work, and create a supportive environment where everyone feels comfortable taking care of themselves, taking time off, and finding work-life balance.

WHO YOU ARE

  • 2-4 years experience in leading system integrations;
  • English is a must. The majority of your stakeholders are native speakers;
  • Hands-on mindset, entrepreneurial and self-driven spirit with a great desire to make things happen;
  • Analytical and quantitative skills are a must, ability to use data and metrics to generate insights, iterate and improve the product;
  • Strong problem solving - be able to structure problems, prioritize and make pragmatic decisions in unstructured environments;
  • Capacity to identify and connect users needs and business needs, and develop effective ideas to meet them;
  • Seen as a plus:
    • Experience with CMS (club management systems) integrations;
    • Experience with Apps integrations;
    • Familiar with the most important integration standards (Restful APIs, Webhooks, Polling, RPC);
    • A true team player who loves working towards both team and individual goals with at least 0-3 years experience in business development, sales, corporate relationship management, or account management.

We recognize that individuals approach job applications differently. We strongly encourage all aspiring applicants to go for it, even if they don't match the job description 100%. We welcome your application and will be delighted to explore if you could be a great fit for our team. For this specific role, please note that prior experience in leading system integrations, advanced to fluent English and analytical and quantitative skills are mandatory requirements.

WHAT WE OFFER YOU

We're a wellness company that is committed to the health and wellbeing of our employees. Our flexible program allows you to customize your benefits, according to your needs!

Our benefits include:

WELLNESS: Health, dental, and life insurance.

FLEXIBLE WORK: Choose when and where you work. For most, this will be a hybrid office/remote structure but can vary depending on the needs of the role and employee preferences. We offer all employees a home office stipend and a monthly flexible work allowance to help cover the costs of working from home.

FLEXIBLE SCHEDULE: Wellhubbers and their leaders can make the best decisions for their scope. This includes flexibility to adjust their working hours based on their personal schedule, time zone, and business needs.

WELLHUB: We believe in our mission and encourage our employees and their families to take care of their wellbeing too. Access onsite gyms and fitness studios, digital fitness programs, and online wellness resources for meditation, nutrition, mental health support, and more. You will receive the Gold plan at no cost, and other premium plans will be significantly discounted.

PAID TIME OFF: We know how important it is that our employees take time away from work to recharge.

Vacations after 6 months and 3 days off per year + 1 day off for each year of tenure (up to 5 additional days) + extra day off for your birthday.

PAID PARENTAL LEAVE: Welcoming a new child is one of the most special moments in your life and we want our employees to take the time to be present and enjoy their growing family. We offer 100% paid parental leave to all new parents and extended maternity leave.

CAREER GROWTH: Outstanding opportunities for personal and career growth. That means we maintain a growth mindset in everything we do and invest deeply in employee development.

CULTURE: An exciting and supportive atmosphere with ambitious people from around the world! You’ll partner with global colleagues and share in the success of a high-growth technology company disrupting the health and wellness space. Our value-based culture of trust, flexibility, and integrity makes this possible every day.

Diversity, Equity, and Belonging at Wellhub

We aim to create a collaborative, supportive, and inclusive space where everyone knows they belong.

Wellhub is committed to creating a diverse work environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, color, sex, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, non-disqualifying physical or mental disability, national origin, veteran status, or any other basis covered by appropriate law.

title: VP Kynor touts TSC at URGED meeting
description:
Trinidad State College Vice President of Operations and Development Jim Kynor was the main speaker for the August meeting of Upper Rio Grande Economic Development. Kynor highlighted some of the most recent accomplishments for the community college and what is in store for the future of the institution.

Photo by Lyndsie Ferrell

Posted Friday, August 16, 2024 8:36 am

By LYNDSIE FERRELL

MONTE VISTA – Members of the Upper Rio Grande Economic Development group welcomed Jim Kynor, Trinidad State College Vice President of Operations and Development of the San Luis Valley Campus, to their meeting on Tuesday, Aug. 13, in Monte Vista.

Kynor began his presentation by stating that the college would be celebrating its 100-year anniversary in 2025 and is the oldest community college in the State of Colorado. “We are really excited to hit this milestone, and we have some wonderful things happening that will elevate Trinidad State College in the next several years,” said Kynor.

Trinidad State serves eight counties throughout Colorado and New Mexico including Colfax County, Saguache, Alamosa, Los Animas, Huerfano, Costilla, Conejos, Rio Grande, and Mineral County. The college has taken steps to fortify their educational programs through innovative learning and economic development.

The college will launch a Bachelor Applied Science program in the fall of this year and re-open the Freudenthal Library and a newly remodeled Romero Hall where the nursing program is held each year.

Beyond the newly opened programs and facilities, Krynor also stated that they have recently signed 10 transfer agreements with Adams State University that will allow students in two-year programs to transfer into four-year programs without having to leave the San Luis valley.

“Having a key partnership with Adams State will strengthen the pipeline from the two-year graduate students to four-year students and we are very delighted in the partnership,” he said.

Kynor was also pleased to announce that Trinidad State was in the top 20 community colleges to receive semi-finalist status for the Aspen Prize through the Aspen Institute program. The college also received $22 Million for renovation and improved campus projects thanks to a recent partnership with other community colleges statewide.

“We have some goals that were set in 2020 and though we realize now that we are at least two to three years away from achieving some of them, we are optimistic and hope to see the change sooner rather than later. There is a changing perception of higher education that includes factors like affordability and value of a degree as well as the need for greater value in transition to jobs, a focus on work-based learning and the recognition of the need for community colleges to be economic development catalysts within their communities,” said Kynor.

The institution is planning to focus more on opening up to the community and offering portions of their facility to the public.

“It does us no good to be a closed campus when we have resources that could help the economy in which we serve,” he said.

The college plans to increase opportunities through training, bringing jobs to the economy by participating in developing entrepreneurships and building innovation centers on campus.

“We are very excited about the success of Trinidad and where the school will go from here,” he said.

title: Senior Unreal Game Engineer (Project Based)
description:
At Amber, we're always on the hunt for the most talented individuals in the industry to join our team. We're dedicated to delivering top-notch service to our customers and know that our employees are key to making that happen. We offer attractive compensation packages and plenty of chances to grow with us, and we're always on the lookout for ways to do things better. Our team works together towards common goals and we value each member's contributions to our mission of continuous improvement and innovation.

About the role:

Hello talented professionals! We're currently looking to expand our pool of talent and invite skilled individuals to join us by applying to this job posting. While specific positions may not be available immediately, we're proactively building a network of qualified candidates for future paid partnerships.

If you're passionate about game development, eager to showcase and improve your skills on major titles, and if you are open to potential partnerships down the line, we encourage you to apply and become part of our expert talent community. We look forward to connecting with you!

As a Game Programmer, you will be working in cross-functional teams involved in different stages of the development of AAA quality titles.

Here's what you can expect:

  1. Profile Preselection: Our Talent Acquisition team will review your profile to ensure it aligns with our requirements and values.
  2. Talent Acquisition Interview: Selected candidates will undergo an initial interview to discuss their experience, skills, and fit for the role.
  3. Online Test: Qualified candidates will be invited to complete an online assessment to demonstrate their abilities.
  4. Technical Interview: Finalists will participate in a technical interview to assess their proficiency and compatibility with our team when a project staffing plan is made.

We're committed to finding the best talent to join our growing team, and we look forward to connecting with you throughout this exciting process.

The Quest:

  1. Find the best technical solution for each game development challenge.
  2. Write code that is readable, easy to debug and maintain.
  3. Actively seek to help your teammates.
  4. Actively participate in planning meetings.
  5. Ensure that all relevant parties are aligned on task specifications.
  6. Help the team improve the quality of their work by eliminating waste from the development process.
  7. Always try to improve the way you do things.
  8. Constantly communicate with your teammates to flag and alleviate risks.

The Skills:

  1. Proficient in working with Unreal Engine or Custom C++ engines.
  2. Fair knowledge of individual game engine Components (Rendering, AI, Networking, Navigation, Physics, UI).
  3. Experience in optimizing for FPS and memory consumption.
  4. Solid knowledge of design patterns and coding architectural principles.
  5. Experience in debugging and profiling large code bases.
  6. At least 5 years experience of game development.

Nice to have:

  1. Shipped at least one PC/Console title.
  2. Good understanding of cross-platform game development.
  3. Good understanding of client-server communication & socket-based network protocols.
  4. Experience using Unit Test frameworks and Integration Test frameworks.

The Reward:

  1. Competitive project-based compensation.
  2. Opportunity to work on exciting and diverse projects.
  3. Clear communication and support throughout the project duration.
  4. Flexibility in project timelines and deadlines.
  5. Potential for long-term collaboration on future projects.
  6. Transparent and fair evaluation of your work.

Ser responsável por todas as atividades relacionadas aos produtos perecíveis, garantindo a qualidade e a disponibilidade dos itens em nossas prateleiras.

Requisitos:

  1. Experiência comprovada na área de perecíveis, especialmente nas áreas de hortifrúti, frios e laticínios, açougue, peixaria e padaria;

  3. Conhecimento das normas e regulamentos de segurança e higiene alimentar;
  4. Excelentes habilidades de comunicação e relacionamento interpessoal.

Oferecemos um pacote salarial competitivo e benefícios adicionais, incluindo plano de saúde, vale-refeição e plano de carreira.


Se você se considera um profissional qualificado, com as habilidades e experiência necessárias para ocupar essa posição desafiadora, envie seu currículo para nós. Estamos ansiosos para receber sua aplicação e discutir como você pode fazer parte da equipe de gestão dos perecíveis da Chama Supermercados.


A Chama Supermercados valoriza a diversidade e incentiva que profissionais de todas as raças, gêneros, idades e com deficiência se candidatem a esta vaga.

title: Solutions Architect (assistant director) - ID #00038
description:
Buscamos un Arquitecto de Soluciones para importante compañía.

Desarrollarás componentes de la arquitectura de datos, compuesta por modelos, políticas, reglas o estándares que rigen qué datos se recopilan y cómo se almacenan, organizan, integran y utilizan en los sistemas de datos, incluyendo el diseño, la construcción y la gestión de la infraestructura de datos para abordar los requisitos comerciales.

Colaborarás con el negocio para entender los requisitos de datos y ayuda a definir y entregar soluciones analíticas que aporten valor comercial.

Tus responsabilidades clave incluyen:

  • Contribuir al desarrollo de la arquitectura de datos para la empresa, desarrollando los modelos y estándares por los cuales se obtienen, almacenan, distribuyen y gobiernan los datos.
  • Apoyar la creación, gestión y monitoreo de la infraestructura local o en la nube, como el diseño de plataformas de datos de extremo a extremo, el desarrollo y las operaciones de la gestión en la nube y el diseño de sistemas distribuidos, manejando datos estructurados y no estructurados.
  • Contribuir al diseño de soluciones que catalogarán, organizarán y almacenarán los datos internos no estructurados de una organización.
  • Realizar la debida diligencia para confirmar que la solución desarrollada cumpla con el diseño arquitectónico.
  • Coordinar a través de equipos multidisciplinarios para entender los requisitos de datos y recomendar mejoras en los procesos internos.
  • Mantener y contribuir a los estándares de gestión de datos para promover la optimización y la coherencia.

Habilidades y atributos:

  • Arquitectura y diseño de soluciones: Capacidad para ayudar a los clientes a diseñar la arquitectura y los requisitos de la solución para la definición del paquete, la construcción de la solución, etc.
  • Incluye arquitectura técnica del sistema, modelos de datos lógicos, modelos de redes, arquitectura y requisitos de hardware. Las arquitecturas incluyen: Servicio de información conceptual, aplicación lógica, aplicación física, datos conceptuales, datos lógicos, datos físicos, servicios de plataforma conceptual, tecnología lógica, tecnología física, seguridad, transición, hoja de ruta de arquitectura.
  • Capacidad para definir los modelos y estándares por los cuales se obtienen, almacenan, distribuyen y gobiernan los datos dentro de una organización.
  • Gestión de contenidos empresariales: Capacidad para definir soluciones que catalogarán, organizarán y almacenarán la información interna no estructurada de una organización, como documentos de Word, correos electrónicos, etc.
  • Gestión de datos maestros, de referencia y metadatos: Capacidades para desarrollar soluciones que definan los datos maestros (glosario interno de elementos de datos clave), los datos de referencia (glosario externo de elementos y valores de datos estándar) y los metadatos (los datos que describen el conjunto de datos).
  • Selección de paquetes y socios: Capacidad para identificar paquetes y soluciones de software que podrían cumplir con los requisitos de la solución del cliente y desarrollar solicitudes de propuesta (RFP) a partir de estos proveedores. Ayudar a los clientes en la evaluación de las propuestas resultantes, incluidas las capacidades y el ajuste del paquete a los requisitos (comerciales y tecnológicos), las propuestas de los proveedores para precios y soporte.

Lo que buscamos:

Buscamos personas que se inicien por sí mismas, que puedan tomar la iniciativa y hacer que las cosas se hagan. Si puedes pensar de manera crítica y creativa para resolver problemas, te destacarás en este rol. Debes sentirte cómodo trabajando con miembros de equipos externalizados y offshore culturalmente diversos, lo que significa que es posible que tengas que trabajar fuera del horario laboral normal en tu zona horaria para asociarte con otro personal de Tecnología del Cliente a nivel global. También se puede requerir algún viaje, tanto nacional como internacional.

Inglés Avanzado/Fluído excluyente

Ubicación: 100% remoto para el interior de Argentina (excepto Neuquén, Rio Negro, Santa Cruz y Chubut). Para candidatos de AMBA, BSAS, CABA, presencial 2 veces por semana / 3WH.

title: Project Director, Conserving the Pantanal and Gran Chaco Wildlands
description:
Project Director, Conserving the Pantanal and Gran Chaco Wildlands

The Environment Portfolio at The Pew Charitable Trusts

For more than 30 years, Pew has been a major force in engaging the public and policy makers about the causes, consequences, and solutions to some of the world’s most pressing environmental challenges. Our environment work spans all seven continents with more than 250 professionals working at the local, national, and international levels to reduce the scope and severity of global environmental problems, such as the erosion of large natural ecosystems that contain a great part of the world’s remaining biodiversity, and the destruction of the marine environment. Pew’s global environmental program focuses on science-based, nonpartisan, and sustainable solutions to help protect the planet and people.

Conserving the Pantanal and Gran Chaco Wildlands
South America’s Pantanal and Gran Chaco regions are among the most ecologically significant tropical wetlands and dry forests on Earth. This area spans parts of Brazil, Bolivia, Paraguay, and Argentina and contains thousands of plant and animal species and provides vital aquatic habitat, nutrient renewal, migration routes, and flood control for millions of animals and people living downstream. The region’s extensive ecosystems are currently threatened by deforestation, drought and intensification of wildfires related to climate change, and thus urgently need conservation action.

The project will work with the policy frameworks in each country to solidify and expand protection of the extraordinary biodiversity of the Pantanal-Gran Chaco region. Pew will partner with local and international conservation organizations, government agencies, and Indigenous governments and organizations to improve management of and expand protected areas, support Indigenous organizations and communities in the management of their territories, promote sustainable management for ranching lands, and to advance long-term conservation financing mechanisms for durable protections.

Position Overview

The Project Director, Pantanal-Gran Chaco Project, will develop and lead implementation of a project to mobilize support for durable conservation measures in order to maintain the ecosystems and biodiversity of the Pantanal Chaco region in close collaboration with partner organizations.

The project director oversees a multi-country strategy working on large scale land and freshwater conservation in the Pantanal Chaco. This position manages staff in Bolivia, and relationships with consultants and partner organizations across Bolivia and Brazil with potential expansion to include Argentina and Paraguay.

The position reports to the Senior Director, Land and Freshwater Conservation. The position is preferably based within one of the following locations: Santa Cruz or La Paz, Bolivia; Campo Grande, Cuiaba, or Sao Paulo, Brazil; or elsewhere within or proximate to the Pantanal and Gran Chaco region.

Candidates must be legally authorized to work in the country for which they are seeking employment without visa sponsorship.

Responsibilities:

  • Foster a work environment that is diverse, equitable, inclusive, and accessible and in line with Pew and the project’s related goals.
  • Develop and supervise implementation of effective project strategies and set achievable and measurable targets that will result in achieving the project’s goals to improve and enhance the protection of the Pantanal Chaco through the countries’ protected area systems, Indigenous territories, sustainably managed ranchlands, and other effective conservation measures.
  • Supervise and support a distributed team of staff and consultants, in order to develop and maintain a highly motivated, well-resourced, and effective collective effort to achieve project goals. Identify capacity needs, including hiring staff and consultants, as necessary to ensure the project has the necessary human resources to achieve its goals.
  • Coordinate closely with partners and other allies and organizations in order to maximize the impact of project strategies, facilitate the development of partnerships and coalitions as appropriate.
  • Develop and maintain working relationships with decision makers, government officials and national and international institutions, as well as relevant NGOs in the field.
  • Develop mechanisms to analyze opportunities for project efforts. Design and oversee cost effective budgets and monitor project expenses as needed.
  • Serve as a spokesperson in order to cultivate and engage the public and key constituencies regarding the tangible mechanisms and measures that can be taken to address the need to conserve the Pantanal-Gran Chaco region.
  • Identify, track, and analyze opportunities that have relevance for project efforts.
  • Determine when goals are at risk of not being met, identify the causes and, when needed, take appropriate steps to fix any problems in ways that keep the project on course.
  • Ensure that information related to the project is adequately communicated internally and coordinate with other projects and units within Pew to enhance the impact of Environment projects more generally.
  • Develop and maintain a broad knowledge of the science and policies relevant to terrestrial and freshwater conservation in the Pantanal Chaco.
  • Represent Pew publicly at conferences, seminars and official forums and as required and appropriate by authoring articles for newspapers, magazines and peer-reviewed journals.
  • Participate in activities that support program and Pew-wide objectives.

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree required or equivalent experience; an advanced degree in law, natural resources policy and management, ecology or biological sciences, or similar fields is preferred.
  • Generally, 10 years of professional experience, including staff, project, and/or consultant management experience.
  • A proven track record of leadership and accomplishment in designing and implementing environmental, conservation, or sustainability programs, with a preference for experience supporting protected area development, Indigenous lands and territories, or sustainability of ranching operations.
  • Extensive experience in project development, coalition building, and building partnerships.
  • Extensive experience working with elected officials, government agencies, and national, regional, and local non-governmental organizations.
  • Excellent political, strategic and analytical skills with proven program management skills to develop, execute and evaluate a range of diverse strategies to achieve goals. A task-oriented, deadline driven style with a focus on achieving clear and ambitious goals. Experience developing and moving projects forward with a high degree of independence and autonomy.
  • Desirable international work experience in biodiversity conservation.
  • Familiarity with institutional frameworks and policy in Bolivia and/or Brazil.
  • Demonstrable experience successfully managing staff and teams based in dispersed geographies, developing and managing productive relationships with consultants, partners and others who contribute to the development of a project by anticipating possible outcomes.
  • Exceptional oral and written communications skills. Skilled at synthesizing material and focusing quickly on the essence of an issue and the means to address it. Confident in presenting one’s own ideas and diplomatically persuading others as appropriate. Competency in communicating complex ideas for a general audience, with strong public speaking skills and experience persuasively engaging individuals or groups in dialogue that results in a desire to take action.
  • Exceptional interpersonal skills, with seasoned judgment and analytical capacity, and a demonstrated strong collaborative spirit and skilled at making decisions.
  • Well-developed skills in diplomacy. Works productively with a wide array of different people and institutions.
  • Fluency in Spanish and English, in addition competence in Portuguese would be preferred.

Travel

  • Frequent travel within the Pantanal-Gran Chaco region and international travel to the United States for this position will be required.

Compensation

  • Pew offers a competitive salary and benefits package.

Qual é a posição?

Assistente Técnico (Luz e Som - Itinerante) - RP 14785 - Sesi Dr. Celso Charuri

Quais são os desafios e as principais responsabilidades?

  • Realizar rotinas de manutenção de equipamentos e do espaço cultural, garantindo seu bom funcionamento;
  • Realizar montagem, instalação e operação de sistemas de som, luz, multimídia e estruturas no local do evento de acordo com a necessidade das atrações e evento;
  • Realizar verificação das conexões e ajustes de níveis de áudio;
  • Realizar posicionamento de microfones e alto-falantes de acordo com a acústica do espaço e as necessidades do evento;
  • Realizar mixagem de áudio ao vivo, ajustando níveis de som, equalização, efeitos e outras configurações em tempo real;
  • Monitoramento constante do som para evitar problemas como ruídos, distorção ou falhas técnicas;
  • Interface com artistas, palestrantes e outros profissionais para garantir a qualidade do som durante a apresentação;
  • Manutenção preventiva e reparos de equipamentos de áudio, luz e multimídia;
  • Reparo de cabos, microfones e outros componentes conforme necessário;
  • Afinação e ajuste das luzes para garantir que a iluminação cubra as áreas desejadas do palco ou do espaço do evento;
  • Operação de sistemas de iluminação durante o evento, ajustando as luzes conforme necessário para criar a atmosfera desejada;
  • Verificação de medidas de segurança para evitar riscos elétricos e outros perigos associados à atividade;
  • Apoio na descrição e cotação de equipamentos de sonorização, iluminação e multimídia, de acordo com a necessidade.

Quais são os principais requisitos?

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Analista de Suporte Residente - Software de Compras/Licitações - Pouso Alegre/MG
description:
Nossopropósitoétransformar o futuro de cidades e pessoas, e pode ser o seu também!

Somos uma GovTech pioneira no desenvolvimento de sistemas inteligentes em nuvem para gestão pública no Brasil, focados na construção de cidades inteligentes. Fomos os primeiros da América Latina a desenvolver sistemas de gestão em cloud computing, considerando empresas públicas e privadas. Criamos ainda a primeira Inteligência Artificial para gestão pública, a Dara, que foi premiada duas vezes em 1° lugar como a melhor solução do Brasil para cidades inteligentes. Hoje, atuamos diariamente para transformar e descomplicar a gestão pública através do que há de melhor na tecnologia, com uma solução única e inteligente para gestão das cidades, seja na Contabilidade, na Saúde, na Educação, ou em mais de uma dezena de áreas.

A IPM é formada por mais de 600 pessoas apaixonadas pela inovação e transformação digital das cidades. Somos movidos por grandes desafios e pelo nosso impacto, e temos um sonho maior ainda: transformar o futuro de cidades e pessoas através do melhor da tecnologia.

Estamos crescendo Brasil afora, e sempre lançando novas soluções que estão transformando o futuro de pessoas e cidades. Em 2022, fomos premiados como um dos 5 melhores times de RH do Brasil. Em 2023, fomos premiados como uma das 2 empresas de software mais inovadoras do Sul do Brasil, uma das melhores empresas para trabalhar no ranking Mulher e no ranking LGBTI+. Em 2024 certificados pela 5ª vez seguida como uma das melhores empresas para trabalhar pela consultoria internacional Great Place to Work (GPTW).

Aqui, valorizamos a inovação, colaboração, sentimento de dono, foco no cliente, atitude descomplicada e ágil, e a mão-na-massa. Por isso, estamos sempre em busca de talentos tão motivados pelo nosso propósito e impacto quanto nós somos, que sejam apaixonados pela tecnologia, e que tenham muita garra para fazer acontecer.

Nessa vaga, seu desafio será:

  • Fornecer suporte técnico em sistemas no ambiente interno do cliente, ajudando a solucionar dúvidas relacionadas ao software e garantindo que sua experiência de uso seja satisfatória;
  • Identificar e descrever possíveis melhorias para implementação do software;
  • Realizar abertura de chamados com base nas solicitações realizadas pelos usuários ou inconformidades identificadas no uso;
  • Realizar treinamento aos usuários do software, esclarecendo as dúvidas pontuais;
  • Manter-se atualizado sobre as tecnologias mais recentes, ferramentas do software e habilidades necessárias em sua área de atuação. Este profissional deve estar preparado para identificar e adotar novas abordagens para trabalhar com o software e ajudar os usuários a aprimorar sua operação e resultados através de nossas soluções, tornando as rotinas da gestão pública mais eficientes e inteligentes.

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Sales Analytics Specialist (BRA)
description:
Com o aumento contínuo das demandas por análises detalhadas nas áreas de negócios e vendas da QMC, o especialista de Sales Analytics desempenhará um papel crucial na geração de insights estratégicos para impulsionar o desempenho comercial.

Como referência técnica em telecomunicações dentro da equipe AEO, o especialista será o principal ponto de consulta para questões e orientações específicas do setor, colaborando diretamente com desenvolvedores e cientistas de dados para o desenvolvimento de modelos analíticos que atendam às necessidades dinâmicas do mercado de compartilhamento de infraestrutura.

Responsável pela coleta, organização e análise de dados provenientes de diversas fontes, o especialista garantirá a integridade e a precisão dessas informações, assegurando que as estratégias de vendas sejam fundamentadas em dados confiáveis. Além disso, ele terá o papel de apresentar esses resultados de forma clara e objetiva, destacando insights relevantes e recomendações práticas para otimizar o desempenho comercial.

Atuando como elo entre o time de dados e o time comercial, o especialista garantirá que as soluções analíticas estejam perfeitamente alinhadas com as necessidades do mercado, contribuindo diretamente para o aumento da eficiência e da eficácia nas vendas.

Responsabilidades:

  1. Referência Técnica em Telecomunicações: Ser a principal fonte de consulta para questões relacionadas a telecomunicações, garantindo que a equipe de analytics entenda o contexto técnico e regulatório da área de telecomunicações.
  2. Desenvolvimento de Modelos Analíticos: Trabalhar em conjunto com desenvolvedores e cientistas de dados para criar, testar e implementar modelos analíticos focados nas necessidades comerciais, como otimização de vendas e gestão de infraestrutura de sharing (torres, DAS e SLS).
  3. Integração Comercial e Técnica: Atuar como elo entre o time de dados e o time comercial, participando ativamente das discussões estratégicas e oferecendo insights que transformem os dados em soluções aplicáveis ao negócio.
  4. Análise e Implementação de Soluções: Analisar grandes volumes de dados para fornecer recomendações que impactem diretamente a performance de vendas, sempre garantindo que as soluções propostas estejam alinhadas com as metas comerciais e da empresa.
  5. Mentoria e Suporte Técnico: Apoiar e orientar o time de AEO, promovendo uma melhor compreensão dos aspectos técnicos e comerciais das telecomunicações, facilitando a troca de conhecimento entre as equipes.

Requisitos:

  1. Atuação na área de telecomunicações – mais de 7 anos.
  2. Análise de dados / Business Intelligence – mais de 4 anos.
  3. Desejável experiência prévia com programação – mais de 1 ano.

Formação:

Formação superior em áreas de exatas, como Engenharia de Telecomunicações, Estatística, ou Ciência da Computação. Formação específica em telecomunicações será um diferencial importante.

Conhecimentos Desejáveis:

  1. Conhecimento em Power BI, Google Earth, QGIS, Salesforce, Ookla.
  2. Conhecimento profundo das operações de telecomunicações, com foco em redes móveis e infraestrutura de compartilhamento.
  3. Familiaridade com técnicas de drive test e walk test, e seu impacto nas decisões estratégicas.
  4. Forte domínio de lógica matemática.
  5. Familiaridade com plataformas de GIS e sistemas de banco de dados estruturados.
  6. Experiência em linguagens de programação como Python e SQL para manipulação e análise de dados.

Competências:

  1. Liderança Técnica: Capacidade de servir como referência e mentor para a equipe, respondendo dúvidas técnicas e ajudando a direcionar o desenvolvimento de soluções.
  2. Visão Estratégica e Comercial: Habilidade em transformar dados em insights estratégicos aplicáveis ao ambiente comercial, com foco no aumento das vendas.
  3. Comunicação Interdisciplinar: Capacidade de articular soluções técnicas de forma clara para o time comercial e traduzir necessidades de negócio em requisitos técnicos para a equipe de dados.
  4. Autonomia e Inovação: Proatividade para identificar novas oportunidades e liderar a implementação de soluções inovadoras para o mercado de telecomunicações e compartilhamento de infraestrutura.
  5. Orientação para Resultados: Foco em entregar resultados que impactem diretamente as metas comerciais, sempre garantindo a aplicabilidade das soluções analíticas.

Inglês e espanhol desejáveis, principalmente para colaborar com equipes internacionais.

title: ANALISTA DE INFRAESTRUTURA SÊNIOR - MULESOFT - SÃO PAULO - SP
description:
ANALISTA DE INFRAESTRUTURA SÊNIOR - MULESOFT - SÃO PAULO - SP

Faça parte do time de Heróis de Sangue Amarelo!

Nosso propósito é Tornar o Mundo um Lugar Mais Seguro e não vamos parar até conseguir, pois somos incansáveis e pensamos positivamente.

Nossa paixão? Cuidar de todos, sejam eles clientes, o planeta ou nossos colaboradores, pois as pessoas são importantes para nós.

Com mais de 40 anos de história, presente em 31 países e com mais de 160.000 funcionários em todo o mundo. Somos uma das empresas líderes mundiais do setor de Segurança Privada, que oferece Soluções Integradas de Segurança, adaptadas às necessidades de nossos clientes.

Toda nossa história não seria possível sem um time de heróis e por isso desenvolvemos diariamente programas específicos para atrair novos talentos e promovemos a carreira dos nossos profissionais com treinamentos contínuos e oportunidades internas de crescimento.

No Brasil, o Grupo Prosegur conta com três linhas de negócio: Segurpro, Prosegur Cash e Cipher. Viva uma excelente experiência, participando de um processo seletivo 100% digital, pois temos equipes dedicadas para garantir a qualidade, segurança e humanização em todas as etapas!

Diversidade & Inclusão na Prosegur

Cada um de nós enxerga o mundo de formas diferentes. Mas uma coisa deve ser comum a todos: o respeito. Acreditamos que a diversidade de perspectivas e experiências garantem um ambiente diferenciado de trabalho!

O Programa Somos Todos Heróis - Diversidade e Respeito vem para fortalecer e apoiar o nosso posicionamento a favor do Respeito e da Inclusão e para trazer conhecimento e conscientização a todos os nossos Heróis. Acreditamos que times diversos podem garantir resultados espetaculares além de impulsionar nossa cultura inovadora.

* Vaga aberta a pessoas com ou sem deficiência. Se você é PCD e possui os requisitos e interesse, junte-se à nossa equipe de Heróis de Sangue Amarelo e venha ser Protagonista de uma história de sucesso!

  • Participar do design e definição da arquitetura de referência de APIs e integração de sistemas aplicável à empresa.
  • Definir e documentar padrões de integração, fluxos de dados e soluções técnicas para os projetos de integração.
  • Criar e gerenciar APIs, conectores, serviços e componentes de integração no MuleSoft.
  • Gerenciar o ciclo de vida das APIs da empresa, tanto no MuleSoft quanto em outras plataformas de APIs (Axway, Azure).
  • Diagnosticar e resolver problemas complexos de integração e desempenho, fornecendo soluções eficientes e escaláveis.
  • Fornecer suporte técnico e orientação às equipes de desenvolvimento e operações em relação às plataformas gerenciadas pela equipe.
  • Implementar e garantir práticas de segurança em todas as soluções de integração, protegendo os dados e as aplicações da empresa.
  • Manter-se atualizado com as últimas tendências e avanços em tecnologia de integração e MuleSoft, propondo melhorias e atualizações para as soluções existentes.
  • Avaliar e adotar novas ferramentas e tecnologias que possam melhorar a eficiência e a qualidade das integrações.
  • Criar e manter documentação detalhada e precisa de todas as arquiteturas, fluxos de integração e configurações.
  • Trabalhar estreitamente com equipes de negócios, analistas e outros stakeholders para entender suas necessidades e traduzi-las em soluções técnicas eficazes.

REQUISITOS IMPRESCINDÍVEIS PARA A INSCRIÇÃO:

  • Graduação completa nos cursos de Engenharia da Computação, Ciência da Computação, Análise de Sistemas ou áreas correlatas.
  • Espanhol avançado.
  • Conhecimento e experiência com a plataforma Mulesoft.
  • Conhecimento da gestão do ciclo de vida da API, desde o design da API e o desenvolvimento da integração até o deployment, as operações e a governança.
  • Experiência com outras plataformas Middleware e gestão de APIs: TIBCO, Axway.
  • Experiência na realização de ajustes de desempenho de aplicações.
  • Conhecimentos em Azure.
  • Conhecimentos e experiência com plataformas de Observabilidade (ELK, LogAnalytics).
  • Conhecimentos e experiência em Java, SQL, Shell Scripts, Git, Jenkins.

LOCAL DE TRABALHO: LAPA / SÃO PAULO.

title: Growth Marketing Manager (SEM) | Remote Work | Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
description:
At BairesDev, we've been leading the way in technology projects for over 15 years. We deliver cutting-edge solutions to giants like Google and the most innovative startups in Silicon Valley.

Our diverse 4,000+ team, composed of the world's Top 1% of tech talent, works remotely on roles that drive significant impact worldwide.

We're hiring a Growth Marketing Manager to spearhead our lead generation efforts through paid channels, focusing on Paid Search and LinkedIn Ads. In this role, you'll drive growth through data-driven experiments and technical implementation, collaborating with our Growth Team.

What You Will Do:

  • Encourage a spirit of curiosity and innovation to explore new approaches and techniques within our paid search campaigns.
  • Optimize existing campaigns and keywords with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring thorough analysis and measurement for continuous improvement.
  • Infuse creativity into our paid search, paid social, and display ad strategies, seeking innovative ways to engage audiences and enhance campaign performance.
  • Develop internal tools to streamline the growth process.
  • Analyze data and propose feature improvements.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and implement growth strategies.
  • Stay updated with the latest growth methodologies and industry trends.

Here’s what we are looking for:

  • 3+ years of experience in Search Engine Ads (Google).
  • 2+ years of experience in LinkedIn Ads.
  • Experience with Google Analytics.
  • Professional or academic experience in Growth Marketing.
  • Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Engineering, Econometrics, Mathematics, Economics, or a related field.
  • Familiarity with business intelligence tools like Tableau, PowerBI, or Qlik.
  • Strong analytical and data-driven mindset with a detailed understanding of business KPIs.
  • Knowledge in SQL, HTML, and Statistics (desirable).
  • 1+ years of experience in Bing Search Engine Ads (desirable).
  • Experience studying, living, or working for US companies.
  • Advanced level of English.

How we make your work (and your life) easier:

  • 100% remote work (from anywhere).
  • Excellent compensation in USD or your local currency if preferred.
  • Hardware and software setup for you to work from home.
  • Flexible hours: create your own schedule.

title: Growth Data Analyst | Remote Work | Sao Paulo, Brazil
description:
At BairesDev, we've been leading the way in technology projects for over 15 years. We deliver cutting-edge solutions to giants like Google and the most innovative startups in Silicon Valley.

Our diverse 4,000+ team, composed of the world's Top 1% of tech talent, works remotely on roles that drive significant impact worldwide.

When you apply for this position, you're taking the first step in a process that goes beyond the ordinary. We aim to align your passions and skills with our vacancies, setting you on a path to exceptional career development and success.

Growth Data Analyst at BairesDev

We are looking for a Growth Data Analyst who will collect, organize, analyze, and extract insights from the growth/marketing-related data, create dashboards and reports, generate hypotheses, and use data to validate them and generate valuable and actionable insights to help the company to make more and better decisions. This professional will work with data engineers, data scientists, architects, account managers, and business partners to build solutions to improve Clients and Sales experiences.

What You Will Do:

- Identify and gather data related to Marketing activities.
- Organize and consolidate data into accessible dashboards and reports.
- Analyze data to extract meaningful, actionable observations and translate complex data into clear, understandable insights.
- Create visualizations such as graphs and charts to enhance data comprehension.
- Promote and contribute to a data-driven approach within the Marketing team.
- Serve as a bridge between various data-related areas to stay updated on emerging touchpoints, data sources, and requirements.
- Actively participate in discussions and decisions related to data analysis processes.

Here’s what we are looking for:

- 3+ years as a Data Analyst in a Growth or Marketing team.
- Professional or academic experience as a Data Analyst, Business Analyst, Data Engineer, Data Scientist, or other related positions.
- Database consulting and handling with SQL.
- Previous experience with Python, R, or another programming language.
- Familiarity with business intelligence tools like Tableau, PowerBI, or Qlik.
- Dataviz experience for data explanation.
- Experience with Explanatory Data Analysis (EDA).
- Fluent in Spanish and intermediate level of English.

How we make your work (and your life) easier:

  • 100% remote work (from anywhere).
  • Excellent compensation in USD or your local currency if preferred
  • Hardware and software setup for you to work from home.
  • Flexible hours: create your own schedule.
  • Paid parental leaves, vacations, and national holidays.
  • Innovative and multicultural work environment: collaborate and learn from the global Top 1% of talent.
  • Supportive environment with mentorship, promotions, skill development, and diverse growth opportunities.

title: BigCommerce Lead (Remote, Latam)
description:
McFadyen Digital is the leading advisor and implementer of eCommerce Marketplace solutions. During 15 years of implementing marketplaces, we’ve built dozens of platforms that cumulatively generate billions of dollars of gross merchandise value (GMV). We’re honored to have supported 10% of the Fortune 500 with their digital marketplace initiatives. Over 250 global brands like ABB, AB InBev, ACCO, Albertsons, American Red Cross, American Eagle Outfitters, US Army, US Agriculture Dept, (and many more) have entrusted their digital transformations to McFadyen. We operate global offices across the US, Brazil, and India. McFadyen Digital has been a trusted employer for 37 years and believes that people are the most important part of our company. We’re proud of our Great Place to Work certification.

Are you a highly skilled and experienced BigCommerce Lead looking for an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact in the world of eCommerce? Join McFadyen Digital, the leading advisor and implementer of eCommerce marketplace solutions with a proven track record of building platforms that generate billions of dollars in GMV. With over 37 years of expertise and the trust of over 250 global brands, including 10% of the Fortune 500, McFadyen Digital is at the forefront of digital transformation.

As a BigCommerce Lead, you will drive the development and management of our BigCommerce-based e-commerce platform. The ideal candidate should have a strong technical background, a deep understanding of e-commerce best practices, and experience leading development teams. This role will involve collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality, scalable, and secure e-commerce solutions that meet our business objectives.

If you have a passion for cutting-edge technology, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and want to be part of a dynamic team shaping the future of eCommerce, we invite you to join us on this exciting journey.

Responsibilities

Top 5 responsibilities

  1. Lead Development Efforts
  2. BigCommerce Platform Management
  3. BigCommerce Development
  4. Integration and Customization

Other responsibilities:

  1. Serve as the technical lead for all BigCommerce projects, overseeing the design, development, and deployment of e-commerce solutions.
  2. Work closely with designers, developers, and project managers to deliver projects on time and within scope.
  3. Manage the BigCommerce platform, including customizations, integrations, and third-party applications.
  4. Ensure the platform is optimized for performance, scalability, and security.
  5. Mentor and guide a team of developers, providing technical direction and support.
  6. Conduct code reviews to ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards.
  7. Lead the design and development of custom BigCommerce themes, plugins, and extensions.
  8. Implement advanced customizations, including API integrations, third-party services, and custom functionality.
  9. Optimize and maintain existing BigCommerce stores, ensuring performance, scalability, and security.
  10. Develop and implement custom solutions, including API integrations, custom plugins, and extensions.
  11. Ensure seamless integration with other systems, such as ERP, CRM, and payment gateways.

Technical Leadership

  1. Provide technical expertise and guidance to junior developers and other team members.
  2. Conduct code reviews to ensure adherence to best practices, coding standards, and quality assurance processes.
  3. Collaborate with project managers, designers, and other developers to define technical requirements and project timelines.

Performance Optimization

  1. Identify and resolve performance bottlenecks in BigCommerce applications.
  2. Implement caching strategies, optimize database queries, and enhance overall application performance.

Quality Assurance

  1. Establish and enforce quality assurance processes to ensure all developments are thoroughly tested and meet requirements.
  2. Identify and resolve any technical issues or bugs in a timely manner.
  3. Stay up to date with the latest BigCommerce updates, industry trends, and emerging technologies.
  4. Promote continuous learning and improvement within the team, encouraging the adoption of new tools and techniques.

Collaboration and Communication

  1. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including UX/UI designers, product managers, and marketing teams, to deliver seamless e-commerce experiences.
  2. Communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders effectively.

Qualifications

Top 5 Qualifications

  1. Deep expertise in BigCommerce development, including the Stencil framework, BigCommerce APIs, and custom theme/plugin development.
  2. Experience with RESTful API development and third-party integrations.
  3. Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and CI/CD pipelines.
  4. Knowledge of cloud services, serverless architectures, and performance optimization techniques.

Other Qualifications

  1. Strong leadership and team management skills.
  2. Excellent problem-solving abilities and attention to detail.
  3. Strong communication skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
  4. Ability to manage projects and work effectively in a fast-paced environment.

Additional Information

What we can offer you

  1. A career with thought leaders who literally wrote the book on Marketplace Best Practices.
  2. A career in the fast-paced world of retail eCommerce, digital marketplaces and platform businesses.
  3. A career with first movers who are deploying new business models and strategies worldwide.
  4. A career in a flat management structure without a rigid hierarchy and bureaucracy.
  5. A career in a culture that rewards creativity and innovation, risk-taking and teamwork.

Building a great company culture is a top priority for McFadyen Digital. We try to provide the best environment possible for team members - one that treats people the way they want to be treated. Culture Index is one of our tools for enhancing our enjoyable and productive people-focused environment. In order to be considered for this position, please follow this link to fill out a short Culture Index survey here . Please use as many descriptors as possible that pertain to you. There are no right or wrong answers.

Your Core Values: Client Focus, Owning the Outcome, Adaptable, Caring

Keywords: Tech Lead BigCommerce, BigCommerce, BigCommerce Developer, BigCommerce Web Developer, BigCommerce Certified, remote work

McFadyen’s goal is to ensure that our clients are able to maximize the return on their technology investment by providing better service to their clients, partners and internal teams. At McFadyen we truly believe our employees are our most valuable asset. Across our locations in the US, Brazil, and India, we offer a world-class work culture that enables top-notch delivery for some of the world’s most influential companies.

McFadyen Digital is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, age, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity / expression, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected under federal, state, or local law, where applicable.

title: Account Executive, Mining
description:
Account Executive, Mining

About Us

Founded 36 years ago, Micromine is a leading provider of next generation technology for the global mineral resources industry. With 22 international offices, we are one of the world's premier mining software companies, with our solutions used in more than 90 countries, including over 50 active mine sites and 3,000 diverse projects.

What We Offer

An established global business, that is growing fast, with market leading benefits:

  • A competitive salary with generous On Target Earnings scheme (paid quarterly).
  • Flexible working arrangements to balance work and home life.
  • Opportunities for professional development and progression.
  • A team first culture and the chance to work within the mining technology industry.

About The Opportunity

As the Mining Solutions Manager, based in Brazil, you will play a vital role in driving new business growth in the LATAM region. Leveraging your extensive sales experience and mining industry knowledge/ network, you will identify new opportunities, build strong relationships, and deliver tailored solutions for our product, Micromine Alastri.

Micromine Alastri is an integrated, intelligent and intuitive open-pit mine planning solution.

Reporting to the Regional Manager, Americas your key responsibilities will include:

  • Managing the end-to-end sales process, including prospecting (cold calling), qualifying leads, nurturing prospects, demonstrating solutions, handling objections, and closing deals
  • Identify and pursue new business opportunities within the mining industry for Micromine Alastri

About You

You will have a proven background in mining engineering, including experience with mine planning and scheduling in Iron Ore projects.

Other key skills, experience, and qualifications:

  • Experience with mine planning software/solutions.
  • Experience with open pit mining.
  • Experience with sales/business development, including driving new business
  • Experience with giving presentations or public speaking.
  • Strong prospecting and qualification skills.
  • Possess a Mining Engineering or related post-secondary degree.
  • English proficiency.

Next Steps

Ready to join the Micromine team? Apply now or visit to learn more.

Sobre a Confiança Supermercados:
A história da Rede Confiança de Supermercados começou pequena, com estrutura simples, poucos recursos, mas com muita vontade de trabalhar, crescer e inovar. O sucesso de nossa trajetória se traduz em Gestão, Intuição, Estratégia, Superação e Capacidade de Expansão.

Hoje, é uma das redes de supermercado mais conceituadas e respeitadas do país, fruto dos desafios e superações protagonizadas pelos seus fundadores: a família Zogheib.

Atualmente contando com 15 lojas estrategicamente localizadas em Bauru, Marília, Jaú, Pederneiras, Botucatu e Sorocaba, um Centro Administrativo, o Confiança Alimentos e um Centro de Distribuição, a Rede Confiança emprega aproximadamente 5.000 colaboradores diretos e está presente também no meio digital com o Confiança Delivery.

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Caregiver - Laguna Hills
description:
About Aarris

At Aarris Homecare, we understand that our caregivers are our best asset and we care about the work that you do. If you’re passionate and committed to client well-being and are looking for a workplace that values your skills and work/life balance, we want to hear from you!

Objective:
Caregivers can work independently in client homes or for a healthcare facility providing personal care to patients. They typically travel to a client's home and help them perform basic domestic tasks like cleaning and activities of daily living such as bathing and providing them with companionship and emotional support.

Job Description:

  • Provide clients with companionship, socialization, and mental stimulation
  • Transport clients to and from appointments, errands, activities, etc.
  • Assist with activities of daily living such as bathing, dressing, toileting, and personal hygiene
  • Assistance with transfers & ambulation
  • Provide medication reminders
  • Prepare and cook meals

Knowledge, Skills & Abilities:

  • Experience with dementia care; Alzheimer's; Parkinson's
  • Empathy and the ability to care for the client’s social, emotional, physical, and mental needs
  • Ability to respond to an emergency situation
  • Physical ability to reach with hands and arms
  • Ability to carry, lift or pull up to 50 pounds, while avoiding injury from transferring, repositioning, or lifting patients
  • Ability to occasionally push/pull objects up to 50 pounds and to bend/kneel to complete activities
  • Physical strength and stamina

What we’re looking for:

  • Committed to providing patients with high-quality care
  • Strong interest in elderly care and memory impairment disorders
  • Energetic and compassionate
  • Team player and great communicator

What we offer:

  • The flexibility to choose your schedule so you can prioritize the things in life that matter to you
  • To be part of a team that cares about the work that you do and strives to make sure you feel valued at work
  • Opportunities for career growth
  • Opportunities for bonuses as you develop with us
  • Referral program - we want to know your friends if they’re as skilled as you are!
  • 401K

Salary Range: $18.00 - $20.00

License/Certification:

  • Current HCA (Preferred)
  • CPR Certification

title: Açougueiro
description:
Atuar como açougueiro, realizando atendimento ao cliente, cortes de carnes, limpeza do ambiente de trabalho, acompanhamento de data de validade dos produtos, acompanhar a quantidade de matéria prima, temperatura dos equipamentos, organização dos produtos nas câmaras frias, exposição nos balcões, ilhas e geladeiras.

Benefícios: Convênio médico, vale transporte, vale refeição e convênio odontológico.

About Chama Supermercados: Uma história trilhada de muito empenho, dedicação e vontade de crescer com a sua família!

Em 1959, com o Japão ainda tentando se reerguer após a Segunda Guerra Mundial e sem muitas oportunidades de trabalho, a família Iwamoto decidiu ir embora para o Brasil, com a promessa de uma terra próspera, onde haveria trabalho para todos. Chegando ao Brasil, a família Iwamoto dedicou-se a plantar hortaliças em uma chácara no bairro de Itaquera (zona leste de São Paulo), vendendo a produção em feiras livres.

Missão: Melhorar a vida das pessoas nas comunidades em que atuamos, oferecendo produtos que superem as suas expectativas, quanto às necessidades e desejos do dia a dia.

Visão: Ser o melhor supermercado do país, tornando-se referência em qualidade, atendimento ao cliente, eficiência e criação de valor a seus acionistas.

Valores: Respeito: Tratar a todos como gostaria de ser tratado. Disciplina: Cumprir as responsabilidades com excelência. Reconhecimento: Valorizar os colaboradores proativos. Produtividade: Ser eficiente em tudo o que faz. Qualidade: Ser referência em trabalho bem feito. Superação: Atuar com melhoria contínua.

#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Coordenador(a) de Operações de Credito Consignado
description:
Descrição

Originalmente de Belo Horizonte, o banco Mercantil está contratando um Coordenador de Operações de Crédito Consignado.


Objetivo: Realizar gestão da operação de averbação, do funil de venda e do processo de monitoramento e gestão de convênios do produto de cartão consignado público, bem gerir a eficiência do processo de averbação manual (operadores) e da operação de averbação através de indicadores e reports. Liderar e desenvolver pessoas.


Requisitos:

  1. Graduação completa, preferencialmente nos cursos de Administração, Economia, Engenharias ou áreas afins.
  2. Pós-graduação desejável.
  3. Atuação prévia em posição de gestão por pelo menos 2 anos.
  4. Experiência anterior em operações de consignado e convênios públicos.
  5. Experiência anterior em instituições financeiras.
  6. Desejável experiência com ferramentas de monitoramento de operação, gestão da eficiência e ferramentas de workflow.

Atribuições:

  1. Gerenciar os processos de averbação de contratos de cartão consignado junto aos órgãos públicos, por meio da utilização de sistemas e plataformas destes, de acordo com os processos estabelecidos e cláusulas contratuais. Gerir a eficiência da operação com indicadores como TMA (Tempo médio de atendimento) / TME (Tempo médio de espera), visando uma constante otimização do processo.
  2. Construir e acompanhar o dia a dia do monitoramento do processo de averbação dos convênios, bem como a efetivação de vendas em todo o funil da operação de cartões consignados públicos. Monitorar indicadores relativos à operação e reportar desempenho da operação.
  3. Gerir e desenvolver pessoas nas disciplinas técnicas de monitoramento e operações, além de ser responsável por criar um ambiente positivo de trabalho. Criar condições e apoiar liderados no processo de desenvolvimento estabelecido pela companhia (Ciclo de desenvolvimento).
  4. Realizar gestão dos convênios realizados, que engloba a gestão administrativa dos convênios (renovação, adesão e inclusão de convênios), a condução dos processos de análise e cadastramento junto às áreas pares e a gestão financeira dos pagamentos (conciliação de valores cobrados pelas processadoras).

title: PORTEIRO INTERMITENTE - PAULISTA - PE
description:
Faça parte do time de Heróis de Sangue Amarelo!

Nosso propósito é Tornar o Mundo um Lugar Mais Seguro e não vamos parar até conseguir, pois somos incansáveis e pensamos positivamente.

Nossa paixão? Cuidar de todos, sejam eles clientes, o planeta ou nossos colaboradores pois as pessoas são importantes para nós.

Trabalhamos para que as pessoas vivam tranquilamente, tanto em seu ambiente físico quanto no digital, a fim de gerar um impacto positivo em sua vida pessoal e profissional.

Com mais de 40 anos de história, presente em 31 países e com mais de 160.000 funcionários em todo o mundo. Somos uma das empresas líderes mundiais do setor de Segurança Privada, que oferece Soluções Integradas de Segurança, adaptadas às necessidades de nossos clientes.

Toda nossa história não seria possível sem um time de heróis e por isso desenvolvemos diariamente programas específicos para atrair novos talentos e promovemos a carreira dos nossos profissionais com treinamentos contínuos e oportunidades internas de crescimento.

Trabalhamos todos os dias para oferecer segurança inovadora com base nas soluções mais avançadas do mercado. No Brasil, o Grupo Prosegur conta com três linhas de negócio: Segurpro, Prosegur Cash e Cipher. Viva uma excelente experiência, participando de um processo seletivo 100% digital, pois temos equipes dedicadas para garantir a qualidade, segurança e humanização em todas as etapas!

Diversidade & Inclusão na Prosegur

Cada um de nós enxerga o mundo de formas diferentes. Mas uma coisa deve ser comum a todos: o respeito. Acreditamos que a diversidade de perspectivas e experiências garantem um ambiente diferenciado de trabalho!

O Programa Somos Todos Heróis - Diversidade e Respeito vem para fortalecer e apoiar o nosso posicionamento a favor do Respeito e da Inclusão e para trazer conhecimento e conscientização a todos os nossos Heróis. Acreditamos que times diversos podem garantir resultados espetaculares além de impulsionar nossa cultura inovadora.

Conheça esta oportunidade de trabalho na Segurpro/ Cash e se você possui os requisitos para a vaga, FAÇA JÁ A SUA INSCRIÇÃO.

* Vaga aberta a pessoas com ou sem deficiência. Se você é PCD e possui os requisitos e interesse, junte-se à nossa equipe de Heróis de Sangue Amarelo e venha ser Protagonista de uma história de sucesso!

  • Recepcionar e controlar a movimentação de pessoas e materiais em áreas de acesso livre e restrito;
  • Fiscalizar e conferir os romaneios e notas de cargas/descargas;
  • Acionar a Segurança em caso de necessidade de atuação;
  • Zelar para que as normas da empresa e do posto sejam cumpridas;
  • Atender colaboradores e clientes;
  • Realizar preenchimento de planilha manual ou informatizada para controle de acesso.

REQUISITOS IMPRESCINDÍVEIS PARA SUA INSCRIÇÃO :

  • Ensino Médio completo ou em curso.
  • Disponibilidade de horário.

REQUISITOS DESEJÁVEIS PARA SUA INSCRIÇÃO :

Experiência com atendimento ao cliente.

Crie e gira perfis para oportunidades futuras.
